title: PiXel ScaLer
ogp-description: This is a web application that can resize pixel arts to illustration style.
exception: An error has occurred. Please contact the developer.
error-invalid-image-type: Please select a png, jpeg or gif. ({filename})
error-invalid-image-size: The pixel size does not match the image size. ({filename})
attention-01: There is a bug where conversion doesn't work with Safari 14 on iPhone. Please try using a PC.
whatis-detail: PiXel ScaLer is a scaling application that provides a relatively easy way to convert pixel art to illustration style art using xBRjs.
usage-step-01: To enlarge full-size pixel art, select x1 for "Original Magnification", to enlarge an enlarged pixel art, select from x2 to x4, depending on the magnification from the original size.
usage-step-02: Set the scale factor (100% to 400%) from the scale (%) input field.
usage-step-03: Click the "select image" button to select an image
usage-step-05: An enlarged illustration style image will be displayed.
usage-step-06: Click the "download ZIP" button or the download icon under the image to save it.
tips-01: Converting pixel art of the original size will yield the best results.
tips-02: Images that are not pixel art will not be enlarged nicely.
tips-03: You can anti-alias the pixel art by setting the scale factor to 100%.
tips-04: The Conversion may fail if the specified pixel size is different from the pixel size of the pixel art.
version-new-notice: The latest version v.{version} has been released
version-new-download: Download it from booth or github!
